About me

Hi, my name is Christian. I first got introduced to code as a college student studying mechanical engineering. From there it ignited a unforseen passion that has continually driven me to explore the exciting and ever expanding world of programming. I was drawn to web development because of how accessible and vast the landscape is - there's always something new express yourself with, something else to learn, and countless opportunities to improve what already exists. When I'm not busy programming, I can usually be found outside enjoying the beach, sneaking in a workout at the gym, or just reading.

Previous work

Quantified

Technology

  • HTML5
  • React / Redux
  • TypeScript / Javascript
  • Jest w/ Enzyme
  • SCSS / CSS
  • NodeJS / Express
  • MongoDB / Mongoose
  • TravisCI

Repo | Demo

Full stack React/Redux application with standalone express API powered by the Best Buy API. Quantified that allows users to scan and organize product data into a table quickly and accurately. These two features work together to reduce internal shrink. Fully supports IE11.

VinylDB

Technology

  • HTML5
  • PUG
  • SCSS / CSS
  • Javascript & jQuery
  • NodeJS & Express
  • Mocha w/ Chai
  • MongoDB / Mongoose
  • TravisCI

Repo | Demo

Server side Javascript web application utilizing the Discogs API. VinylDB tracks, manages, and organizes user's Vinyl collection so that no matter how far away they are from their collection, they will know exactly what they already own.

Roaster Nexus

Technology

  • HTML5
  • SCSS / CSS
  • jQuery
  • Google Maps API

Repo | Demo

My very first web app. Roaster Nexus utilizes the HTML5 geolocation API to connect users with local coffee roasters. Users can also explore and discover other coffee roasters across the United States.
